person.content:
Please identify the "Person" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Russian tax and cabinet authorities , under pressure from the International Monetary Fund to boost tax revenues as a condition for receiving payments of a $ 10 billion , three-year loan to Moscow , have been striking fear into the hearts of some of Russia 's most prominent industrial firms by saying they must pay up or face liquidation .

Let's think step by step.

| Person |
| --- |
| Russian tax and cabinet authorities |
| International Monetary Fund |
| Moscow |

These are the valid entities mentioned in the paragraph. The entities are presented precisely as they appear in the original paragraph.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Person" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Person |
| --- |
| Russian tax and cabinet authorities |
| International Monetary Fund |

These are the valid entities mentioned in the paragraph that clearly refer to persons. The entities are presented precisely as they appear in the original paragraph. Other entities such as "Russia" and "Moscow" are not considered persons in this context.
